AI Description: scvi-tools is a comprehensive toolbox for deep probabilistic modeling, batch effect correction, clustering, differential expression, and visualization in single-cell RNA-seq data analysis. It provides a flexible and scalable framework for integrating multiple data modalities and capturing uncertainty in high-dimensional genomics data.
Core Features: Deep Probabilistic Modeling, Batch Effect Correction, Clustering, Differential Expression Analysis, Visualization Tools
General Tags: Single-Cell RNA-Seq, Data Analysis, Genomics, Bioinformatics
